semantic__feedback-statement.semantic__p: BIPM Pavillon de Breteuil F-92312 Sèvres Cedex FRANCE

semantic__clause.semantic__p: The purpose of this procedure is to describe how the Executive Committee of the JCTLM appoints its Chair from among individuals suggested to serve in this position by the JCTLM Executive Committee Member Organizations, and selects the organization acting as the Secretariat of the JCTLM from among those nominated by the JCTLM Executive Committee Member Organizations.
The scope of this document is limited to the selection of the Chair of the Executive Committee and the organization serving as the Secretariat of the JCTLM.
All acronyms and definitions employed in the JCTLM Executive procedure documents are given in the procedure document JCTLM EXE-G01, Glossary of terms and definitions.

Responsibilities and authority of the Executive Committee of the JCTLM are derived from the Declaration of Cooperation between the BIPM, IFCC and ILAC, for the operation of the Joint Committee for Traceability in Laboratory Medicine (JCTLM).

semantic__clause.semantic__title: (Role of the) Chair of the JCTLM Executive Committee

semantic__clause.semantic__p: The Chairman of the Executive Committee of the JCTLM leads the Executive Committee which oversees the operation of the JCTLM.

The Chairman of the Executive Committee inherits the Chairmanship of the Database Working Group which is tasked to evaluate against relevant international documentary standards the nominated reference materials and measurement methods/procedures, as well as reference measurement (calibration) services performed by reference laboratories. The JCTLM nomination and review process employed by the Database WG is described in the procedure documents available at:
The Chairman of the Executive Committee shall be selected by the Executive Committee from individuals nominated by the Executive Committee Member Organizations.
The term of the chairmanship of the Executive Committee shall be two years, renewable for an additional period of two years, and shall not exceed four consecutive years.

semantic__clause.semantic__title: Nominations of candidates to serve as Chair of the JCTLM Executive Committee

semantic__clause.semantic__p: Reappointment of the Chair or selection of the successor to the current chair will be made on a two year cycle at an annual meeting of the Executive Committee.

The Secretariat shall inform the representatives of the JCTLM Executive Committee Member Organizations that the nominations are open for candidates to serve as Chair of the Executive Committee approximately 6 months prior to the annual meeting of the Executive Committee.

Representatives of the Executive Committee Member Organizations shall inform the Secretariat by email of their nominee and if deigned necessary or useful, the credentials that qualify their nominee to serve as Chair of the JCTLM Executive Committee.
Nominations must be received by the Secretariat for distribution to the members of the Executive Committee one month prior to the Executive Committee meeting.

semantic__clause.semantic__title: Selection of the Chair of the Executive Committee

semantic__clause.semantic__p: The JCTLM Executive Committee will review nominations for the position of Chair of the JCTLM at its annual meeting.
One nominee is selected by consensus of the members of the Executive Committee to serve for a two year term.
The operation of JCTLM is managed by the JCTLM Secretariat.

The role of the Secretariat will include: the calling of meetings; preparation of agendas and action lists; and the maintenance of the JCTLM database and website. The procedures for the operation of the Secretariat are available at:
The organization that hosts the Secretariat of the JCTLM is selected by the Executive Committee from among suggested candidate JCTLM Executive Committee Member Organizations.
The individual acting on behalf of the Secretariat at the hosting organization is selected by the host organization with the consent of the Executive Committee.
The Secretariat of the JCTLM shall serve for renewable two year periods.

semantic__clause.semantic__title: Nomination of the organization hosting the Secretariat

semantic__clause.semantic__p: The Secretariat shall inform the representatives of the JCTLM Executive Committee Member Organizations, that the renewal or replacement of the organization serving as Secretariat can be entertained approximately 6 months prior to the annual meeting of the Executive Committee.
This announcement will be made simultaneously with the call for nominations for Chair position of the JCTLM.
Suggestions for change of organization must be received by the Secretariat for distribution to the members of the Executive Committee one month prior to the relevant Executive Committee Meeting.

semantic__clause.semantic__title: Selection of the organization to host the Secretariat

semantic__clause.semantic__p: The JCTLM Executive Committee will consider proposal to relocate the Secretariat at its annual meeting and select by consensus of the members of the Executive Committee the alternative organization to serve as Secretariat for a two year term.
If no proposal to relocate the JCTLM Secretariat is received one month prior to the biennial meeting the term of the Secretariat will automatically renew for an additional 2 year period.
The Declaration of Cooperation for a Joint Committee for Traceability in Laboratory Medicine available at:

semantic__tr.semantic__td: Document modified after the revision of the Declaration of Cooperation in April 2016
Editorial modifications after revision of the Declaration of Cooperation in December 2019

clause.title: 1.Purpose
clause.p: The purpose of this procedure is to describe how the Executive Committee of the JCTLM appoints its Chair from among individuals suggested to serve in this position by the JCTLM Executive Committee Member Organizations, and selects the organization acting as the Secretariat of the JCTLM from among those nominated by the JCTLM Executive Committee Member Organizations.

clause.title: 2.Scope
clause.p: The scope of this document is limited to the selection of the Chair of the Executive Committee and the organization serving as the Secretariat of the JCTLM.

clause.title: 3.Acronyms and definitions
clause.p: All acronyms and definitions employed in the JCTLM Executive procedure documents are given in the procedure document JCTLM EXE-G01, Glossary of terms and definitions.

clause.title: 4.Responsibilities and authorizations
clause.p: Responsibilities and authority of the Executive Committee of the JCTLM are derived from the Declaration of Cooperation between the BIPM, IFCC and ILAC, for the operation of the Joint Committee for Traceability in Laboratory Medicine (JCTLM).

clause.title: 5.1.(Role of the) Chair of the JCTLM Executive Committee

clause.p: The Chairman of the Executive Committee of the JCTLM leads the Executive Committee which oversees the operation of the JCTLM.

The Chairman of the Executive Committee inherits the Chairmanship of the Database Working Group which is tasked to evaluate against relevant international documentary standards the nominated reference materials and measurement methods/procedures, as well as reference measurement (calibration) services performed by reference laboratories. The JCTLM nomination and review process employed by the Database WG is described in the procedure documents available at:
The Chairman of the Executive Committee shall be selected by the Executive Committee from individuals nominated by the Executive Committee Member Organizations.
The term of the chairmanship of the Executive Committee shall be two years, renewable for an additional period of two years, and shall not exceed four consecutive years.

clause.title: 5.2.Nominations of candidates to serve as Chair of the JCTLM Executive Committee

clause.p: Reappointment of the Chair or selection of the successor to the current chair will be made on a two year cycle at an annual meeting of the Executive Committee.

The Secretariat shall inform the representatives of the JCTLM Executive Committee Member Organizations that the nominations are open for candidates to serve as Chair of the Executive Committee approximately 6 months prior to the annual meeting of the Executive Committee.

Representatives of the Executive Committee Member Organizations shall inform the Secretariat by email of their nominee and if deigned necessary or useful, the credentials that qualify their nominee to serve as Chair of the JCTLM Executive Committee.
Nominations must be received by the Secretariat for distribution to the members of the Executive Committee one month prior to the Executive Committee meeting.

clause.title: 5.3.Selection of the Chair of the Executive Committee

clause.p: The JCTLM Executive Committee will review nominations for the position of Chair of the JCTLM at its annual meeting.
One nominee is selected by consensus of the members of the Executive Committee to serve for a two year term.

clause.title: 5.4.Secretariat of the JCTLM
clause.p: The operation of JCTLM is managed by the JCTLM Secretariat.

The role of the Secretariat will include: the calling of meetings; preparation of agendas and action lists; and the maintenance of the JCTLM database and website. The procedures for the operation of the Secretariat are available at:
The organization that hosts the Secretariat of the JCTLM is selected by the Executive Committee from among suggested candidate JCTLM Executive Committee Member Organizations.
The individual acting on behalf of the Secretariat at the hosting organization is selected by the host organization with the consent of the Executive Committee.
The Secretariat of the JCTLM shall serve for renewable two year periods.

clause.title: 5.5.Nomination of the organization hosting the Secretariat

clause.p: The Secretariat shall inform the representatives of the JCTLM Executive Committee Member Organizations, that the renewal or replacement of the organization serving as Secretariat can be entertained approximately 6 months prior to the annual meeting of the Executive Committee.
This announcement will be made simultaneously with the call for nominations for Chair position of the JCTLM.
Suggestions for change of organization must be received by the Secretariat for distribution to the members of the Executive Committee one month prior to the relevant Executive Committee Meeting.

clause.title: 5.6.Selection of the organization to host the Secretariat

clause.p: The JCTLM Executive Committee will consider proposal to relocate the Secretariat at its annual meeting and select by consensus of the members of the Executive Committee the alternative organization to serve as Secretariat for a two year term.
If no proposal to relocate the JCTLM Secretariat is received one month prior to the biennial meeting the term of the Secretariat will automatically renew for an additional 2 year period.

clause.title: 6.Related documents
clause.p: The Declaration of Cooperation for a Joint Committee for Traceability in Laboratory Medicine available at:
